^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

OnHandSpares.description: The type of resources in the set.
OnHandSpares.longDescription: The type of resources in the set.

ReplacementSpareSets.description: Other spare sets that can be utilized to replenish this spare set.
ReplacementSpareSets.longDescription: Other spare sets that can be utilized to replenish this spare set.

SpareResourceSet.description: A description of a set if spare resources.
SpareResourceSet.longDescription: The values define a set of spares of a particular type.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Links.description: Contains links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This structure shall contain references to resources that are not contained within this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OnHandLocation.description: Location where this set of spares is kept.
OnHandLocation.longDescription: The location where this set of spares is kept.

ResourceType.description: The type of resources in the set.
ResourceType.longDescription: The type of resources in the set.

TimeToProvision.description: Amount of time needed to make an on-hand resource available as a spare.
TimeToProvision.longDescription: Amount of time  needed to make an on-hand resource available as a spare.

TimeToReplenish.description: Amount of time needed to get more on-hand resources.
TimeToReplenish.longDescription: Amount of time to needed replenish consumed on-hand resources.

title: #SpareResourceSet.v1_0_0.SpareResourceSet
